1396620.name: Captain Disaster in: Death Has A Million Stomping Boots Demo
1396620.description: This demo is a slightly abridged section of Act II in the game - meaning you will get approx 45 minutes worth of gameplay which will give you a good idea of whether or not you will enjoy the game, but when you encounter this section in the game itself, some of the puzzles will be expanded or changed.
1396620.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
